00019 #ifndef _FFT_PROCESSOR_TO_BC_HPP_cm130210_
00020 #define _FFT_PROCESSOR_TO_BC_HPP_cm130210_
00021 
00022 #include "FFTProcessor.hpp"
00023 #include "network/broadcaster.hpp"
00024 
00025 template<typename FFTFloat>
00026 class FFTProcessorToBC : public FFTProcessor<FFTFloat> {
00027 public:
00028   FFTProcessorToBC(const boost::property_tree::ptree& config)
00029     : FFTProcessor<FFTFloat>(config)
00030     , broadcaster_(network::broadcaster::broadcaster::make(config.get_child("Broadcaster")))
00031     , started_(false)
00032     , station_info_(config.get<std::string>("StationInfo")) {}
00033 
00034   virtual ~FFTProcessorToBC() {}
00035 
00036 protected:
00037   typedef typename FFTProcessor<FFTFloat>::ResultMap ResultMap;
00038   virtual void dump(const typename ResultMap::value_type& result) {
00039     if (not started_) {
00040       broadcaster_->start();
00041       started_= true;
00042     }
00043     const std::string path(result.second->name());
00044     result.second->dumpToBC(path, result.first, broadcaster_, station_info_);
00045   }
00046 private:
00047   network::broadcaster::broadcaster::sptr broadcaster_;
00048   bool              started_;
00049   std::string       station_info_;
00050 } ;
00051 
00052 #endif // _FFT_PROCESSOR_TO_BC_HPP_cm130210_
00053
